summary: Fixed comprehensive copy/paste keyboard shortcuts (Ctrl+C, Ctrl+V) implementation. Resolved duplicate handlers, event conflicts, function declaration order, and improved event handling with capture phase. Added enhanced feedback and logging. Copy/paste now works reliably across the spreadsheet.
current_status: Copy/paste functionality is fully functional with keyboard shortcuts. All linting errors resolved and proper event handling implemented. Ready for user testing of Ctrl+C and Ctrl+V operations.
